verbs.description: [ARG0: ABC host Whoopi Goldberg] [V: blasted] [ARG1: Roseanne Barr] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARG2: for sharing a picture which had been manipulated to depict Goldberg , a " The View " co - host , wearing a shirt with a graphic image of President Trump] .
